title: Sans Serif, Bold
content:
Hi there

I'm hoping someone can help me - I'm looking for the typeface attached - I'm sure it's a default typeface?  
Many thanks for your help, it is really appreciated!!

Regards,  
caperobin

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2014-06-14 at 9.53.41 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725015338/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202014-06-14%20at%209.53.41%20AM.png) | 21.92 KB |
author: caperobin

comments.content:
Your typeface is **[ITC Eras Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725015338/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Eras%20Bold%20ITC%20-%20Regular&fid=d5213044cfad1e4f4b5d1f3138752a80&fsize=60&text=Boccia%20Bandits&wrap=2)**

What do you mean by "default typeface"?  
If you ask if it's included on MS-Windows/Mac OS or it comes with some other standard software product, the answer is No.  
It's a commercial font and you should buy it separately to acquire a license to use it.
